item.description:
Apologies for the short notice, this was just brought to my attention however we don't need a big turnout to be effective.

This is the largest event of it's kind in New England, 600 tables are expected. We have found gun shows to be excellent places to spread the message of Liberty, and all it takes is a few patriots to get the job done. The show is Saturday & Sunday, but rather than clutter I've scheduled just one meetup.

The shows start at 9am (9am - 5pm Saturday, 9am - 3pm Sunday), from what I've seen it starts to get full around 10am on so we don't have to get there right when it opens. We will have plenty of literature on hand, we just need a few folks to help distribute it. If you can make it, please RSVP and let us know your eta & days you can come. We'll update this meetup with specific times as they solidify.

Â 

Promotional flyer: http://users.erols.com/fasttrack/loc/w-spr/SPRINGFIELD%20MILITARY%20FLYER%20JUNE%2012.pdf
item.how_to_find_us: Call 1-888-494-CT4L(2845) to coordinate exact meeting place in the lot.
item.name: 19th Annual W. Springfield Militaria Gun & Knife Show - June 2nd & 3rd
